title: The plants are made from metal?
text: I feel like an idiot, I've been walking around for hours looking for materials and the whole time they were right in front of me.
These strange shell like plants are actually composed mostly of iron, a few of these would be more than enough to fix my ship.
I've taken a few with me, but as there were more near the ship I'll get the rest I need from there to save my carrying it all back.
